sentences.en: Earpieces: Small advertisements on either side of a newspaper's masthead.
sentences.cn: 耳位广告: 在报纸版头两边的细小广告.

sentences.en: The bark was dressed with masthead flags only.
sentences.cn: 那条三桅帆船只用桅顶旗装饰.

sentences.en: These are therefore sometimes called masthead sloops.
sentences.cn: 因此有时我们也把这类帆船叫做桅顶单桅帆(masthead sloops)。

sentences.en: This is where you would setup your company site masthead and navigation.
sentences.cn: 可以在该框架中设置公司站点报头（masthead）和导航。

sentences.en: We carry illustrations of these medals on our masthead.
sentences.cn: 我们在报头刊登这些奖章的图片。

trans.tran_en: the name of a newspaper, magazine etc printed in a special design at the top of the first page
